title: Tigris Tunnel Inscriptions
description: The so-called Tigris Tunnel is a cave ca. fifty miles north of DiyarbakÄ±r, Turkey and it forms a source of the Tigris River. In its vicinity there are several Assyrian monuments, including five inscriptions.

properties.description: The given coordinates are based on recent Google satellite imagery and annotated satellite imagery provided in Schachner and Karen Radner 2008. The caves/tunnels with the inscriptions are visible.
